comment.author: 59356005@N02
comment._content: I believe this is the 1st Livingstonia which was set up at what is now Cape Maclear

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: Yes this is Old Livingstonia, Cape Maclear Bay.  A better photo exists in "Cape Maclear", by P.A. Cole-King, Malawi Dept. of Antiquities Publication no. 4, 1968.  Again NOT AT CHITIMBA..
